Steven is a great strategic thinker, and has an ability to frame and communicate solutions to difficult problems in a way that compels people to action. He is a great guy, certainly someone who is fun to spend time with, and he has a high level of personal integrity.

Ryan Trujillo
Senior Marketing Manager at WalkMe™
July 28, 2016, Steven was a client of Ryan’s

I met Ryan initially when buying season tickets for the Quakes inaugural campaign in their new stadium. He spent time getting to know me and my family as part of that process and built a professional relationship with me. Ryan then planned an event for a local business group of which I am a part. It was the first event of its kind at the Quakes facility. He was able to handle multiple changes in availability of key members of the program and still figured out a way to create an exceptional program for senior executives from around the Bay Area.Those good experiences led my team at GoDaddy to work with Ryan to create a corporate event at the stadium that met our unique needs for family involvement, food and a game.  He was able to work with the different groups at the Quakes and our staff to create a memorable and fun evening.  We are going back again this year in just a few weeks.Throughout these experiences he has provided great customer service that has been very warm and personal.  He’s built authentic relationships with the people he has met and has been a positive brand ambassador for the Quakes. Ryan’s ability to build relationships and get work done means he has the potential to contribute to any organization.

Nancy Smithline
Director, HR Business Partner at GoDaddy
January 20, 2015, Steven worked with Nancy in different groups

Nancy and I worked together twice, once when she was my HR Business Partner and again she led Intuit's Rotational Development Program and I was the executive sponsor.  As my HRBP, Nancy worked as a member of my extended leadership team, asking questions about how to build the business and build the organization. Nancy built a strong relationship with me which led me to recommend that she pick-up and grow the RDP program for Intuit.

summary: Entrepreneur and business leader who has helped grow multiple companies by creating teams, growing people, improving the customer experience, building partnerships, and championing acquisitions.Loving working with my colleagues at GoDaddy to level the playing field to help small business start, run and grow.

title: Chief Product Officer at GoDaddy. Tilting the world's economy in favor of small business.
